remarks.para: You can create a registry key that is available only in memory and that will not be persisted when the computer is restarted. This is known as a volatile key. You can specify that you want to create a volatile or non-volatile key by using the method overloads that take an parameter.

summary.para: Specifies options to use when creating a registry key.
